subScenes.name: 进门问候
subScenes.description: 顾客进店与店员打招呼并说明来意

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi there! I'm looking for a pet that's good for apartments.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨！我在找适合公寓养的宠物。

responses.text: Hey! I can help with that. What kind of pet are you thinking of?
responses.text_cn: 嗨！我可以帮您。您想养哪种宠物？

responses.text: Of course! We've got lots of apartment-friendly pets.
responses.text_cn: 当然！我们有很多适合公寓养的宠物。

responses.text: Sure thing.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用简单句表达需求，避免长句

qaPairs.speakerText: I've never had a pet before, so I need something low-maintenance.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我以前没养过宠物，想要个好打理的。

responses.text: No worries! Cats or small dogs like Cavaliers are perfect starters.
responses.text_cn: 别担心！猫或小型犬比如卡瓦利尔很适合新手。

responses.text: Hmm, maybe a hamster? Super easy.
I'd recommend a fish.

qaPairs.usageNote: 新手可直接问推荐，简化决策

subScenes.name: 询问品种
subScenes.description: 顾客询问具体宠物品种的特性

qaPairs.speakerText: How loud are Cavalier King Charles dogs? I'm in an apartment.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 卡瓦利尔犬叫得大声吗？我住公寓。

responses.text: Not really—they're quiet and chill. Perfect for condos!
responses.text_cn: 不太叫，性格安静，特别适合公寓！

responses.text: They bark sometimes, but not too much.
Quiet.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体问题锁定关键需求

qaPairs.speakerText: Do they need a lot of exercise?

responses.text: A short walk and some playtime daily’s enough.
responses.text_cn: 每天散散步、玩会儿就够了。

responses.text: Nah, they’re couch potatoes.
Minimal exercise needed.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用口语词如 couch potatoes 增强真实感

subScenes.name: 确认价格与细节
subScenes.description: 顾客询问价格、包含服务及购买条件

qaPairs.speakerText: How much is the puppy? Does the price include shots?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 小狗多少钱？价格包含疫苗吗？

responses.text: It's $800, and yeah, all shots and microchip are included.
The shots are extra—about $100 more.
Included.

qaPairs.usageNote: 直接问是否包含服务，避免后续纠纷

qaPairs.speakerText: Can I take it home today?

responses.text: Sure! Just sign the paperwork and pay, and you're good to go.
responses.text_cn: 当然！签个单、付款就能走。

responses.text: We need a home check first—sorry.
Not today.

qaPairs.usageNote: 询问提货条件，明确下一步动作

subScenes.name: 道别与感谢
subScenes.description: 顾客决定购买后与店员礼貌道别

qaPairs.speakerText: I'll take him! Thanks so much for your help.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我就要这只了！太感谢你的帮助了。

responses.text: Awesome! Here’s your care guide—call us if you got any questions.
responses.text_cn: 太棒了！这是护理指南，有事随时打电话。

responses.text: No problem! Enjoy your new buddy!
responses.text_cn: 不客气！好好享受新伙伴！

responses.text: Thanks!

qaPairs.usageNote: 道别时表达感谢并确认后续支持
